results.p: Steel doesn't become weaker with heat, it becomes softer due to the crystalline structure of steel. This actually makes it tougher/stronger as a ...
Steel-type. The Steel-type was introduced in Pokémon Gold & Silver in 1999 with some Pokémon and moves being altered to match the type.
The Steel-type is one of the seventeen types in Pokemon Vega. There are 34 Steel-type Pokémon, which is 8.8% of all Pokémon.

What are the strengths and weaknesses of the steel type in ...
results.p: Steel types have higher defense and has poison immunity. They have a weakness to fighting, fire, ground. Can be strong against rock and ice ...

results.t: Steel Type Pokemon Strength and Weakness Chart
results.p: Steel-type Pokémon are distinguished by a great defense against physical and special attacks and great resistance. They tend to be heavy and therefore slow.
